task.summary:
feat - built skeleton view
View.App : -> initialized the main window -> set the main JPanel with header
Issues : menu bar does not appear in window neither the main panel
Todo : fix the last issues to show menu bar + main panel

fix - insert toolbar + header view
View.App : -> insert toolbar -> insert header with rechercher button + jtextflield
Issues : appear only when resizing the window size
Todo : fix the last issues

fix - reorganised view's skeleton
View.App : -> included initialise method into app constructor
Issues : main content missing... :/
Todo : fix the last issues

fix - rebuilt view
View.App : -> add all elements on view
Issues : need to resize the page for the picture to appear...
Todo : fix the last issues

fix - Insert all variables into the app constructor view
View.App : -> insert variables into the constructor for futur iteration with multiple products
Issues : need to resize the page for the picture to appear...
Todo : fix the last issues

feat -add listeners in view
View.App : -> add listener quitter -> add listener voirPanier -> add listener Rechercher
Model.BddConnexion : ->Created class
Issues : need to resize the page for the picture to appear...
Todo : fix the last issues Connect the database and get product in an array list Add iteration to show multiple product

feat -created the database model
Model.Bdd : -> add created the database model -> fix driver dependencies (.idea/libraries)
Issues : fix sql errors to get results in an arraylist...
Todo : fix the last issues Connect the database and get product in an array list Add iteration to show multiple product on view

feat -created the model phone class
Model.Bdd : -> get number of phones -> get a list of phone's characteristics -> tests
Issues :
Todo : fix the last issues
Add iteration to show multiple product on view

feat - completed view + model
Model.Bdd : -> got db info in view -> added iteration in view -> added detail popup -> added sql dump -> tests
Issues : view only well appear when resizing the screen... still don't know why... :/
Todo : move listeners into the controller package

feat - completed panier view
View.Bdd : -> Enabled items to be added to cart -> test : works with multiples items
Issues : view only well appear when resizing the screen... still don't know why... :/
Todo : move listeners into the controller package

feat - completed all functionalities
View.Bdd : -> Added the search function -> test : doesn't work with multiples items...
Issues : view only well appear when resizing the screen... still don't know why... :/
Todo : move listeners into the controller package + improve code
